subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Aaron Harang no-hit the Mets for seven innings before David Wright singled against a Braves reliever for the Mets’ only hit in a shutout defeat at Citi Field.
snippet: Aaron Harang no-hit the Mets for seven innings before David Wright singled against a Braves reliever for the Mets’ only hit in a shutout defeat at Citi Field.
